dict.acceptation: 神圣的；值得尊敬的，值得推崇的；圣洁的，圣徒般的；宗教的；

sent.orig: There are no holy places and no holy people, only holy moments, only moments of wisdom.
sent.trans: 世界上没有神圣的地方或神圣的人，只存在某些神圣的时刻，那就是智慧迸发的时刻。

sent.orig: A holy person is required to read the Holy Bible.
Joy, lovely divine light, Daughter of Elysium. Holy One, to thy holy kingdom.
sent.trans: 欢乐，圣洁之光。你是极乐世界的女儿。圣者将归于天堂！

sent.orig: Sanctified Light (Holy) now also increases the critical chance of Holy Shock.
sent.trans: 神圣光芒（神圣系）现在同时增加神圣震击的暴击几率。

sent.orig: Holy Shield: Whenever Holy Shield is active, all spell damage taken is reduced by 2%.
sent.trans: 神圣之盾：当盾激活的时候，所有法术降低2%攻击。
